pages.title: Indigo Mushrooms
pages.text: Underground you can find caves full of these mushrooms!

$(#008cff)Indigo Mushrooms$() are bouncy and can be made into $(#008cff)Silkshroom Stew$()! Also $(#008cff)Mushroom Crystals$() will commonly grow as a fruit under these mushrooms. They are a good source of light and can be picked up instantly!

pages.name: Silkshroom Stew
pages.text: $(#008cff)Indigo Mushrooms$() can also be used for food if you have some $(#008cff)Silkberries$() lying around.
